name: SL1D3R
description:
SL1D3R is a fast paced skill / reaction game made for Code IT Out Jam #1 '22.

You are an inmate in an overpopulated prison colony, the solution to this unsustainable situation is the Freedom run. A bomb in your helmet and seconds on the clock impossible odds for a chance to walk free, 

Theme Try, try again

Limitation Space-bar only

This was fun :)

Controls....  well Space-bar. You can do a bit with so please experiment, if you want to survive you are going to master it as well as the level. 

Please give me feedback :)
